name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE CONCERT】J-RAP in JIGOKU! + NEW 3D MODEL REVEAL! #JRAPinJIGOKU [dN7gTC10XLE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope performs 'GILA GILA' by Ado on a rooftop stage overlooking a neon city.
Applause and intermission after the song performance.
MC section where Mori Calliope reveals and discusses her brand-new 3D model and the concert venue.

subtitles.original: MS腕立てから何ヒット？
subtitles.english: How many hits since MS push-ups?

subtitles.original: 鳴き続きはないヒット
subtitles.english: No consecutive hits for crying

subtitles.original: ヒットしてないヒットにも
subtitles.english: Even the hits that didn't hit

subtitles.original: 言われるお前は誰？
subtitles.english: ask you, who are you?

subtitles.original: 愛すならまず退ける あの日ワズが言ってた事
subtitles.english: If you love, step aside first. What Waz said that day.

subtitles.original: 天国から見守る 死ぬ前のあいつも言っていた
subtitles.english: Watching from heaven. That guy said it too, before he died.

subtitles.original: 逃げられない今更 水晶に仕掛ける罠
subtitles.english: Can't escape now. A trap set in the crystal.

subtitles.original: Give me Gucci, Pucci and Prada 急いで着て Abercrombie
subtitles.english: Give me Gucci, Pucci and Prada. Quickly put on Abercrombie.

subtitles.original: I don't got time to play with you 黄泉の鐘が掛かる
subtitles.english: I don't got time to play with you. The bell of Hades tolls.

subtitles.original: 耳をかっぽじって聞きな 耳揃えてすぐに Pay off
subtitles.english: Clean out your ears and listen. Put it all together and pay off immediately.

subtitles.english: Haters, thanks for your hard work. Work hard, the neck is sparkling.

subtitles.original: 混ざり気ない純100％のVVSのチェーン 足元からほらほら
subtitles.english: Pure 100% VVS chain. Look from the feet, see?

subtitles.original: 違いがわかるこの立ち方 靴ならDior たちも
subtitles.english: The way I stand shows the difference. If it's shoes, Dior, even they...

subtitles.original: ヒットヒットヒット ずっとリート きっと ヘイターズ ずっと シット
subtitles.english: Hit hit hit. Always lead. Surely, haters always shit.

subtitles.original: 一歩一歩ずっと走り出す Shit Do it 一緒 俺鳴る Shikkyo
subtitles.english: Step by step, always running out. Shit, do it together, my sound is death.

subtitles.original: A-Zに呼ばれてどれだけが Set set set
subtitles.english: Called by A-Z, how many are set set set?

subtitles.original: Alexに下ろして作ってもらったこの Drip
subtitles.english: Got this drip custom made by Alex.

subtitles.original: いくら稼いでも足りねえ円 やりたいことに Bet bet bet
subtitles.english: No matter how much I earn, it's not enough Yen. Bet bet bet on what I want to do.

subtitles.original: 投資して若稼ぐから倍にしなけども天の神にちょっと相談
subtitles.english: Investing and earning while young, double it, but consult the God of Heaven for a bit.

subtitles.original: 相心の調子はどう？I ran to the wiseもアイスボックスでBust down
subtitles.english: How's your state of mind? Even 'I ran to the wise' is bust down in the icebox.

subtitles.original: 犬もそこで声 有言実行スノーカップサバやりたいことが言ってたらたまたま叶っとり
subtitles.english: Even the dog's voice there. Keeping my word, Snow Cup Saba. If you say what you want to do, it just happens to come true.

subtitles.original: この3人なら立ちまちバズったり 欲しいものなら手に入れる片っ端
subtitles.english: With these three, we'll go viral in no time. Get whatever you want, one after another.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿にしてた奴らは赤っ恥
subtitles.english: Those who made fun of us are in deep shame.

subtitles.original: Woah woah 出始めから右肩上がり 待て気付いてないように奴ばかり
subtitles.english: Woah woah, soaring from the start. Wait, there are only those who haven't noticed.

subtitles.original: 音の上で俺生意気盛り
subtitles.english: On the sound, I'm at the peak of my cockiness.

subtitles.original: Woah woah 俺の乗る波のウェイ やれること制限はねえ
subtitles.english: Woah woah, on the wave I ride. There's no limit to what I can do.

subtitles.original: この口で稼ぐ円
subtitles.english: The Yen I earn with this mouth.

subtitles.original: なかなかこうも上手くいかないと思うけど Real life
subtitles.english: I think it doesn't always go this well, but that's real life.

subtitles.original: 稼ぐ額増やすぜ去年の倍 Okay
subtitles.english: I'll increase the amount I earn, double last year's. Okay.

subtitles.original: ゲトー高みから一抜け切った 川崎生まれのB-Boy da
subtitles.english: I've broken out from the ghetto heights. I'm a B-Boy born in Kawasaki.

subtitles.original: ただのBad boyからなるビリオネア 口座に積んでる今9桁
subtitles.english: A billionaire made from a mere bad boy. Now 9 digits piled in the account.

subtitles.original: キラキラってあいつはジェラス 嫌いな奴らが狙
subtitles.english: Shinning, and he's jealous. The ones I hate are the target.

subtitles.original: ダラダラしたら馬鹿 Magic cityでバラまくダラー
subtitles.english: If you're lazy, you're a fool. Scattering dollars in Magic City.

subtitles.original: 可愛いあの子もこっち来た ソファーにゆっくり腰掛けて
subtitles.english: That cute girl came here too. Sitting slowly on the sofa.

subtitles.original: オールドヴィントンの骨董店 会計男気でジャンケン
subtitles.english: Old Vinton's antique shop. Rock-paper-scissors to see who pays like a man.

subtitles.original: 今は好きなものチョイスしてるから未来のビジネス投資してる
subtitles.english: Now I'm choosing what I like, so I'm investing in future business.

subtitles.original: ジョービに全てを使いちまってる 寒すぎ今頃凍死してる
subtitles.english: I've used it all up on equipment. It's too cold, I'm freezing to death about now.

subtitles.original: ゾクゾク 規模は上がってくセイド 見つめるエイムは高彩度
subtitles.english: Thrilling, the scale is rising. The aim I'm watching is high saturation.

subtitles.original: ここまで来て爆死才能 これ闇の中でフルサイクル
subtitles.english: Coming this far, a talent for exploding. This is a full cycle in the darkness.

subtitles.original: 後先より全額ベット 当てれば一夜にして天国
subtitles.english: Betting everything regardless of the future. If I win, it's heaven overnight.

subtitles.original: スリ買い取り凍える監獄 夢から醒め今から交渉
subtitles.english: Pickpocketing and buying, a freezing prison. Waking from the dream, now for the negotiation.

subtitles.original: 数億円する商談 藤原ヒロシの履いてるJordan
subtitles.english: A business deal worth hundreds of millions. Jordan shoes worn by Hiroshi Fujiwara.

subtitles.original: お前じゃ割れない俺らの冗談 痛細かいかも狙く勝じゃん
subtitles.english: You can't break our jokes. It might be painful and meticulous, but it's a win for the aim.

subtitles.original: ゼロから手にした二つの勝算 あいつのヘイトもおカネと交換

subtitles.english: The pole points to the top and the crown. Drawing a border line between you and me.

subtitles.original: Tsunami wave 夜街に降らす雨
